activities: Yaana Technologies, LLC generally does not collect personal information directly from individuals in the European Union. Instead, Yaana Technologies acts only as a Trusted Third Party for its customers to meet mandates imposed by national authorities.  Pursuant to such activity, Yaana Technologies may have access to personal information controlled by Yaana Technologies' business customers concerning their customers in the context of the services they provide.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
